txt.en: 'Thank you for you efforts here at Nen Hilith.'

Trouble arose at Nen Hilith when wolves made their way into the valley. Workers gathering the fallen wood of the vale were driven out, and the sickle-flies, mostly a nuisance, fled the vale and infested the nearby wood. Glade-wardens have come to the vale of Nen Hilith to attempt to discern the cause of the disturbance.

'Your arrival heralds a time of hope. We have yet to discern what caused the wolves to empty into this valley. Perhaps with your assistance, we will soon learn the reasons behind the invasion.\n\n'The two other glade-wardens here, Glavrolnen and Helhathel, will explain the tasks that I set before them. See to their requests and earn their favour, and you shall have mine.'

Glavrolnen and Helhathel are at the Elf-camp in Nen Hilith.\n\nOvorlas is pleased at your arrival and has set you to earning the favour of his assistants, Glavrolnen and Helhathel, in the vale of Nen Hilith.
'You have done well here, [placeholder]. We will keep vigil here at Nen Hilith. I think now you are needed elsewhere.\n\n'We shall not soon forget all you have done for us here at Celondim.'
Ovorlas is at the Elf-camp in Nen Hilith.\n\nNow that you have earned the favour of Glavrolnen and Helhathel, you should return to Ovorlas.
'My assistants will tell you what they need to accomplish. When you have earned their favour, return to me.'
'Thank you for you efforts here at Nen Hilith.'
Talk to Ovorlas at Nen Hilith
'Thank you for you efforts here at Nen Hilith.'
